fields.label: Our Movement WYSIWYG
fields.name: our_movement_wysiwyg
fields.instructions:
If pasting text from another source (Word etc), make sure that Paste as Text (the icon of a clipboard with a T) is enabled, so that you strip it of any formatting. Rather do formatting (bold, italic, headings, etc) within the editor below. 

If you would like to add headings in the text, change the heading from Paragraph to Heading 2.
